quantity.description: number of contracts for one instance of the strategy

days-to-expiration.description: calendar days to find the expiration date

strike-selection-method.description: how the strike price is found for this leg.  delta selects the strike that is closest to the specified value, relative selects a strike at a fixed offset from the previous leg. **TODO:`percent` and `fixed premium`?

strike-selection-value.description: the value that will be used for the specified method.  depending on the method the value will represent different units

round-nearest.description: only strikes divisible by this value will be selected. Use 0 or 1 for no rounding
